QuestData.Title: A Mourneblade Born
QuestData.Description:
While his father was missing, I cared for Anduin like a son. To see him like that, at the mercy of Sylvanas...
<Bolvar's eyes flare with fire.>
Something must be done.
Take a moment. Let me know when you are ready to discuss what comes next.
QuestData.LogDescription: Discuss the vision with Bolvar and the others.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Lady Jaina Proudmoore in Oribos.
